title: Complementary Colors
description: A short lesson to help you apply Complementary Colors.

hook.text: Orange and blue. Red and green. Purple and yellow. These pairs vibrate when placed side by side.

buildup.text: Complementary colors sit directly opposite each other on the color wheel. They create maximum contrast.

twist.text: Too much complementary contrast looks garish. The best photographs balance the ratio â€” dominant and accent.

climax.text: Sunsets naturally use complementary colors: warm oranges and pinks against cool blue skies and shadows.
